title: In Space No One Can Hear You Laugh
description: Limited Edition Hardback. Get ready to laugh your helmet off! Here are 37 of the funniest stories by award winning author Mike Resnick. Meet a Jewish Tonto and find out what "Kemosabee" really means, learn why America was put up for auction and who bought it, follow some of the adventures of John Justin Mallory, the detective from an alternate New York, much more.
author: Mike Resnick
